feed.title: Ryan Chouinard's PEAR channel Latest Releases

entry.title: PHPass 2.1.0beta1 (beta)
entry.content:
This is a beta release! Come changes are not backwards-compatible with previous releases. Please be sure to test this release thoroughly before using it in a live environment!
- Update API to add new verify() methods. These are used to verify that a config string or hash belongs to an adapter.
- Dropped Blowfish alias for Bcrypt adapter.
- Added Md5Crypt adapter.
- Added Sha1Crypt adapter.
- Added Sha256Crypt adapter.
- Added Sha512Crypt adapter.
- Update PBKDF2 adapter to be compatible with other standards. The output of the PBKDF2 adapter is NOT compatible with previous versions!
- Other bug fixes and enhancements.

entry.title: PHPass 2.0.2 (stable)
entry.content: - Deprecated Blowfish adapter in favor of Bcrypt adapter. - Added flag to protable adapter to generate phpBB compatible hashes. - Added ability to change hash identifier when generating bcrypt hashes (2a, 2x, 2y - defaults to 2y).

entry.title: PHPass 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: - Added functionality for calculating password strength scores based on various algorithms. - Removed \Phpass base class. - Added \Phpass\Hash and \Phpass\Strength classes. - Moved hash adapter classes into \Phpass\Hash\Adapter namespace. - Created \Phpass\Strength\Adapter namespace for strength calculator adapters. - First pass at making the library PSR-0 compliant. - Addition of library autoloader functionality.

entry.title: PHPassLib 3.0.0beta1 (beta)
entry.content: First beta release of 3.0 series, which introduces a new static API.
